name: FxRemoteWindowAPI_v2
desc: A protocol that allows the plug-in to request that the host create a window with a defined minimum and maximum size.

items.name: func remoteWindow(withMinimumSize: CGSize, maximumSize: CGSize, reply: ((NSView?, Error?) -> Void)!)
items.desc: Requests the host application to create a window with a minimum and maximum size that displays a custom UI.
